data.name: FitInsideEdges
data.comment: Used in the sliding message panel

data.name: FitInsideEdgesRadio
data.comment: Used in the options window in the Auto-scaling tab

data.name: FitInsideEdgesRadioToolTip
data.value:
Make the two closer image edges touch the screen box edges. The visible part of the image content can be aligned with the mouse.
When activated, you can press the "Forward" or "Back" mouse buttons to animate alignment of all images.
data.comment: Used in the options window in the Auto-scaling tab

data.name: FitInsideEdgesWhenZoomedRadioToolTip
data.value: Make the two closer image edges touch the screen edges. The visible part of the image content can be aligned with the mouse.
data.comment: Used in the options window in the Auto-scaling tab

data.name: FitOutsideEdges
data.comment: Used in the sliding message panel

data.name: FitOutsideEdgesRadio
data.comment: Used in the options window in the Auto-scaling tab

data.name: FitOutsideEdgesRadioToolTip
data.value: Make the two more distant image edges touch the screen box edges. The entire image content is always visible.
data.comment: Used in the options window in the Auto-scaling tab

data.name: FitOutsideEdgesWhenZoomedRadioToolTip
data.value: Make the two more distant image edges touch the screen edges. The entire image content is always visible.
data.comment: Used in the options window in the Auto-scaling tab

data.name: GroupImagesCheckBox
data.comment: Used in the options window in the Miscellaneous tab

data.name: GroupImagesToolTip
data.value:
Switch between grouping images with only the groups being shuffled, and shuffling all images (if unchecked).
The option also changes the meaning of the mouse wheel. Switches respectively between scrolling all images, and scrolling the neighbors of one image (if unchecked). To scroll all images, use the mouse wheel in the corners of the window.
data.comment: Used in the options window in the Miscellaneous tab
